languages.text: "Человек, который сказал, что исполнение долга — всегда счастье, либо не все знал о долге, либо жил очень печальной жизнью".
"Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."
languages.original_text: "Человек, который сказал, что исполнение долга — всегда счастье, либо не все знал о долге, либо жил очень печальной жизнью".

traits.locale_text: "Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."
"Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."
"Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."
"Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."

languages.text: “凡是那些说‘快乐与责任同在’的人，要么从来没承担过任何责任，要么活得非常悲惨。”
languages.original_text: "Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."

traits.locale_text: “凡是那些说‘快乐与责任同在’的人，要么从来没承担过任何责任，要么活得非常悲惨。”

languages.text: «El que dijera que el deber da la felicidad no debía de tener muchos deberes. O eso, o su vida era espantosa».
languages.original_text: "Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."

traits.locale_text: «El que dijera que el deber da la felicidad no debía de tener muchos deberes. O eso, o su vida era espantosa».

languages.text: 「務めを果たせば喜びがあると言う連中は、そもそも義務なんて持ったことないか、心底つまらない人生を送っているかのどちらかでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."

traits.locale_text: 「務めを果たせば喜びがあると言う連中は、そもそも義務なんて持ったことないか、心底つまらない人生を送っているかのどちらかでしょう」

languages.text: "Wer auch immer behauptet hat, die Pflicht brächte Freude, hatte entweder nie Pflichten oder ein sehr jämmerliches Leben."
languages.original_text: "Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."

traits.locale_text: "Wer auch immer behauptet hat, die Pflicht brächte Freude, hatte entweder nie Pflichten oder ein sehr jämmerliches Leben."

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas qui a dit qu'il y avait de la joie dans le devoir, mais de toute évidence, soit il n'a jamais connu le devoir, soit il a eu une vie bien misérable. »
languages.original_text: "Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas qui a dit qu'il y avait de la joie dans le devoir, mais de toute évidence, soit il n'a jamais connu le devoir, soit il a eu une vie bien misérable. »

languages.text: "Görevlendirildiğine sevinen kişinin ya hiç görevi olmamış ya da kendisi çok sefil bir hayat sürmüş."
languages.original_text: "Whoever said that joy follows duty either never had any duties or lived a very miserable life."

traits.locale_text: "Görevlendirildiğine sevinen kişinin ya hiç görevi olmamış ya da kendisi çok sefil bir hayat sürmüş."
